class_notes: Online Asynchronous with some synchronous sessions, dates TBD.
course_description: This course focuses on the role of the neonatal nurse practitioner in contemporary management of high risk and critically ill neonates/infants up to two years of age. Emphasis includes developing differential diagnoses, comprehensive care and management across the continuum (acute-critical-chronic care).
sections: Class Nbr: 3221, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Conway-Orgel, Status: Open
